Amino acid side chain property values

Source: R/amino_acids_properties.R
amino_acids_properties.Rd

A dataset containing the amino acid side chain property values —composition, polarity and molecular volume. These values were obtained from Table 1, Grantham (1974), doi:10.1126/science.185.4154.862 .

Usage

amino_acids_properties

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 20 rows and 4 columns.

Source

Table 1, Grantham (1974), doi:10.1126/science.185.4154.862 .

Examples

amino_acids_properties
#> # A tibble: 20 × 4
#>    amino_acid     c     p     v
#>    <chr>      <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 Ser         1.42   9.2  32  
#>  2 Arg         0.65  10.5 124  
#>  3 Leu         0      4.9 111  
#>  4 Pro         0.39   8    32.5
#>  5 Thr         0.71   8.6  61  
#>  6 Ala         0      8.1  31  
#>  7 Val         0      5.9  84  
#>  8 Gly         0.74   9     3  
#>  9 Ile         0      5.2 111  
#> 10 Phe         0      5.2 132  
#> 11 Tyr         0.2    6.2 136  
#> 12 Cys         2.75   5.5  55  
#> 13 His         0.58  10.4  96  
#> 14 Gln         0.89  10.5  85  
#> 15 Asn         1.33  11.6  56  
#> 16 Lys         0.33  11.3 119  
#> 17 Asp         1.38  13    54  
#> 18 Glu         0.92  12.3  83  
#> 19 Met         0      5.7 105  
#> 20 Trp         0.13   5.4 170
